customer_name: Garden State Discovery Museum Center For Learning
site_name: GARDEN STATE DISCOVERY MUSEUM CTR FOR LEARNING
narrative:
No non compliant items identified on this prelicense inspection.
The facility and records, at site 001, meet the minimum standards and regulations of the Animal Welfare Act.
NOTES:  
*  The applicant wants to become a Class "C" Exhibitor with two sites.
*  Site 002 does not meet the minimum standards and regulations at this time.
REGULATED ACTIVITIES ARE NOT PERMITTED UNTIL A USDA EXHIBITOR'S LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
